briefTitle: Collection of Patient-Reported Symptoms and Performance Status Via the Internet
officialTitle: Collection of Patient-Reported Symptoms and Performance Status Via the Internet
conditions: Prostate Cancer, Breast Cancer, Lung Cancer, Colorectal Cancer, Leukemia, Multiple Myeloma
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Willingness of approached patients to participate in this study this study
eligibilityCriteria:
DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS:

* Enrolled on clinical trial CALGB-90401, CALGB-30607, CALGB-30704, CALGB-40601, CALGB-40603, CALGB-40502, CALGB-40503, CALGB-70604, or CALGB-80405

PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS:

* Able to read and comprehend English language text
* Able to see a computer screen (i.e., no visual impairments) or be accompanied at visits by someone who can read the screen for the patient

PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY:

* See Disease Characteristics
